DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if there is improvement or measurable change in cognition after only one month of treatment with donepezil when using a computerized test battery. The results at one month will be compared with the results at 3 months to evaluate this.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Cognitive Function as Measured by Repeated Cognitive Measures After 12 Weeks Treatment With Donepezil
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of probable AD according to NINCDSADRDA criteria. The patient should live with an appropriate caregiver at home, or in a community dwelling. A caregiver should be capable of accompanying the patient to clinic visits or attending study visits in the patient's home. Patient and caregiver should understand, speak, and read local language. Significant neurological disease or dementia other than AD, e.g., mixed dementia, frontotemporal dementia, and Parkinson's Disease. Females of child bearing potential Impaired vision or hearing
DOC.keyword: Patients with Mild to Moderate Alzheimer's Disease
